attributes.additional_details:
Advise the annual amount of political donation received by the UK parties in power from each country to which foreign aid is given so that the foreign aid amount is compared with the political donation received in the UK from that country in a year.

Advise the top six annual salaries paid to the administrators and whether the annual salary increment is tied to the rest of the civil service or is the increment tied to the increasing amount of annual foreign aid each year. Provide a compare of top six salaries with those paid to top six salaries paid in UK charities.
